alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 10 at 8:39PM CDT until May 10 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Central Sheridan County in northwestern Kansas... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 839 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hoxie, Seguin and Angelus. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
